result.detailedDescription: AI-powered distributed energy platform delivering clean, reliable power in Global South. The company powers prosperity by providing renewable electricity to unserved and underserved communities. It utilizes an AI-enabled distributed energy resources (DER) platform to serve communities, commercial & industrial (C&I) businesses, and individual households. It offers flexible pay-as-you-go options. The company's assets are grid interoperable, supporting national electrification efforts. The platform leverages artificial intelligence to optimize energy demand, maximize renewable energy mix, and enhance customer service. It focuses on clean energy, renewable energy, solar power, rural electrification, energy access, commercial and industrial solar, rural e-commerce, digital finance, distributed renewable energy, community solar, and solar minigrids.

result.detailedDescription: Cyber-hardened, hybrid-fiber networking solutions enabling immediate Gigabit performance and network protection. They maximize existing network infrastructure, offering cost-effective, fast project completion. They specialize in hybrid-fiber networking, combining fiber with existing copper and coaxial lines for rapid IoT network expansion, connecting cameras, sensors, and Wi-Fi backhaul. Their solutions cater to intelligent traffic systems, smart rail, smart cities, IoT-enabled sites, utilities, military, and multi-dwelling units. They provide business Ethernet, residential broadband, and backhaul services. Their product portfolio includes Ethernet switches, fiber optic switches, cybersecurity solutions, and broadband amplifiers. They leverage technologies like Fiber, G.fast, G.hn, G.SHDSL, and VDSL2. They offer cybersecurity through MetaShield, providing asset intelligence and threat detection. Their networking solutions include Ethernet in the First Mile (EFM) and Carrier Ethernet . They focus on secure, resilient monitoring and control of IP and IoT systems, offering powerful connectivity for various industries and businesses.
result.shortDescription: Cyber-hardened, hybrid-fiber networking solutions enabling immediate Gigabit performance and network protection
result.name: Actelis

specialFlags.name: Artificial Intelligence
specialFlags.reason:
Core product: Creative app suite (LTX Studio, Facetune, Photoleap, Videoleap) powered by proprietary generative AI models.
AI centrality: Core products are explicitly powered by proprietary AI models (LTXV).
Proprietary AI tech: Proprietary generative AI models like LTXV (autoregressive streaming, multiscale rendering).
Moat / defensibility: Proprietary AI models, open-source contributions, technical architecture, AI-focused team, validated legacy pivot.

result.detailedDescription: Provider of e-mail phishing detection solutions. It is a provider of e-mail phishing detection, simulation training, and intelligence. It provides organizations with the ability to improve the employees resilience towards spear phishing, malware, and drive-by attacks and further, facilitate employee-sourced detection of such attacks. The solutions include a suite of products for collecting, analyzing, and responding to verified active threats. The simulations cover mails for ransomware, business email compromise, spear phishing and social engineering attacks, malware, malicious attachments, drive-by attacks, and conversational phishing attacks.
